粉.definition: powder; cosmetic face powder; food prepared from starch; noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour; to turn to powder; (dialect) to whitewash; white; pink; (suffix) fan (abbr. for 粉絲|粉丝[fen3si1]); to be a fan of

粉刷.definition: to paint; to whitewash; emulsion; plaster

粉塵.definition: dust; airborne powder; solid particulate matter

粉墨登場.definition: to make up and go on stage (idiom); to embark on a career (esp. in politics or crime)

粉拳.definition: soft, ineffectual fist (usu. of a woman)

粉板.definition: blackboard; painted board on which to make temporary notes with brush pen

粉條.definition: vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc

粉牆.definition: whitewashed wall; to whitewash a wall

粉碎.definition: to crush; to smash; to shatter

粉粿.definition: (Tw) jelly made from starch, esp. sweet potato starch

粉紅山椒鳥.definition: (bird species of China) rosy minivet (Pericrocotus roseus)

粉紅椋鳥.definition: (bird species of China) rosy starling (Pastor roseus)

粉紅燕鷗.definition: (bird species of China) roseate tern (Sterna dougallii)

粉紅胸鷚.definition: (bird species of China) rosy pipit (Anthus roseatus)

粉紅腹嶺雀.definition: (bird species of China) Asian rosy finch (Leucosticte arctoa)

粉絲.definition: bean vermicelli; mung bean starch noodles; cellophane noodles; fan; enthusiast for sb or sth (loanword from "fans")

粉色.definition: pink; white; erotic; beautiful woman; powdered (with make-up)

粉艷.definition: delicate colors (of a woman's complexion, a flower etc)

粉芡.definition: cooking starch; pasty mixture of starch and water

粉身碎骨.definition: lit. torn body and crushed bones (idiom); fig. to die horribly; to sacrifice one's life

粉轉黑.definition: (Internet slang) to go from being an admirer to being a detractor

粉領.definition: pink collar; woman working in the service industry

粉飾.definition: to paint; to whitewash; to decorate; plaster; fig. to gloss over; to cover up

粉飾太平.definition: to pretend that everything is going well

粉餅.definition: pressed cosmetic powder (formed into a cake); compact powder

粉黛.definition: face powder and eyebrow liner; cosmetics; (fig.) beautiful woman
